entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , L'Anse-au-Loup
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:14 AM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, -5.5°C
entry.summary:

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 78 %

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 15 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness near midnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 16 this evening. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy or ice pellets. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy and blowing snow beginning in the morning then changing to ice pellets in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 15 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 80 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Friday 23 December 2022
